verses.verse: And there shall come forth<WH3318> a shoot<WH2415> out of the stock<WH1503> of Jesse<WH3448>, and a branch<WH5342> out of his roots<WH8328> shall bear fruit<WH6509>.

And the Spirit<WH7307> of Jehovah<WH3068> shall rest<WH5117> upon him<WH7307>, the spirit of wisdom<WH2451> and understanding<WH998>, the spirit<WH7307> of counsel<WH6098> and might<WH1369>, the spirit<WH7307> of knowledge<WH1847> and of the fear<WH3374> of Jehovah<WH3068>.

And his delight<WH7306> shall be in the fear<WH3374> of Jehovah<WH3068>; and he shall not judge<WH8199> after the sight<WH4758> of his eyes<WH5869>, neither decide<WH3198> after the hearing<WH4926> of his ears<WH241>;

but with righteousness<WH6664> shall he judge<WH8199> the poor<WH1800>, and decide<WH3198> with equity<WH4334> for the meek<WH6035> of the earth<WH776>; and he shall smite<WH5221> the earth<WH776> with the rod<WH7626> of his mouth<WH6310>; and with the breath<WH7307> of his lips<WH8193> shall he slay<WH4191> the wicked<WH7563>.
And righteousness<WH6664> shall be the girdle<WH232> of his waist<WH4975>, and faithfulness<WH530> the girdle<WH232> of his loins<WH2504>.

And the wolf<WH2061> shall dwell<WH1481> with the lamb<WH3532>, and the leopard<WH5246> shall lie down<WH7257> with the kid<WH1423>; and the calf<WH5695> and the young lion<WH3715> and the fatling<WH4806> together<WH3162>; and a little<WH6996> child<WH5288> shall lead them<WH5090>.
And the cow<WH6510> and the bear<WH1677> shall feed<WH7462>; their young ones<WH3206> shall lie down<WH7257> together<WH3162>; and the lion<WH738> shall eat<WH398> straw<WH8401> like the ox<WH1241>.
And the sucking child<WH3243> shall play<WH8173> on the hole<WH2352> of the asp<WH6620>, and the weaned child<WH1580> shall put<WH1911> his hand<WH3027> on the adder<WH6848>'s den<WH3975>.

They shall not hurt<WH7489> nor destroy<WH7843> in all my holy<WH6944> mountain<WH2022>; for the earth<WH776> shall be full<WH4390> of the knowledge<WH1844> of Jehovah<WH3068>, as the waters<WH4325> cover<WH3680> the sea<WH3220>.

And it shall come to pass in that day<WH3117>, that the root<WH8328> of Jesse<WH3448>, that standeth<WH5975> for an ensign<WH5251> of the peoples<WH5971>, unto him shall the nations<WH1471> seek<WH1875>; and his resting-place<WH4496> shall be glorious<WH3519>.

And it shall come to pass in that day<WH3117>, that the Lord<WH136> will set<WH3254> his hand<WH3027> again<WH3254> the second time<WH8145> to recover<WH7069> the remnant<WH7605> of his people<WH5971>, that shall remain<WH7604>, from Assyria<WH804>, and from Egypt<WH4714>, and from Pathros<WH6624>, and from Cush<WH3568>, and from Elam<WH5867>, and from Shinar<WH8152>, and from Hamath<WH2574>, and from the islands<WH339> of the sea<WH3220>.

And he will set up<WH5375> an ensign<WH5251> for the nations<WH1471>, and will assemble<WH622> the outcasts<WH1760> of Israel<WH3478>, and gather together<WH6908> the dispersed<WH5310> of Judah<WH3063> from the four<WH702> corners<WH3671> of the earth<WH776>.

The envy<WH7068> also of Ephraim<WH669> shall depart<WH5493>, and they that vex<WH6887> Judah<WH3063> shall be cut off<WH3772>: Ephraim<WH669> shall not envy<WH7065> Judah<WH3063>, and Judah<WH3063> shall not vex<WH6887> Ephraim<WH669>.

And they shall fly<WH5774> down upon the shoulder<WH3802> of the Philistines<WH6430> on the west<WH3220>; together<WH3162> shall they despoil<WH962> the children<WH1121> of the east<WH6924>: they shall put<WH4916> forth their hand<WH3027> upon Edom<WH123> and Moab<WH4124>; and the children<WH1121> of Ammon<WH5983> shall obey them<WH4928>.

And Jehovah<WH3068> will utterly destroy<WH2763> the tongue<WH3956> of the Egyptian<WH4714> sea<WH3220>; and with his scorching<WH5868> wind<WH7307> will he wave<WH5130> his hand<WH3027> over the River<WH5104>, and will smite<WH5221> it into seven<WH7651> streams<WH5158>, and cause men to march over<WH1869> dryshod<WH5275>.

And there shall be a highway<WH4546> for the remnant<WH7605> of his people<WH5971>, that<WH834> shall remain<WH7604>, from Assyria<WH804>; like as there was for Israel<WH3478> in the day<WH3117> that he came up<WH5927> out of the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714>.
